**General Information:**

ClamHost offers non oversold VPS Products on Low Density nodes. we don't pack our VPS Nodes. we offer a Premium Service at a low Price. with 20Gbps Free Arbor Powered DDoS Mitigation with all our products and services. we can filter up to L7 Attacks this Includes all types of HTTP Floods and TCP Floods. Having a Issue with DDoS Attacks then [Contact ClamHost](https://billing.clamhost.com/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=1)
